title: 820-01598-A (iSight bad) need schematic.
message:
I have a 820-01598-A that has a damaged part near the monitor plug. iSight is not working.
Does anyone have schematics for this 

I think I can get by without it.  It is close to the same design as the 820-00840 just different placement arrangement but if anyone has this board view / schematic I want it.

title: 820-01598-A (iSight bad) need schematic.
message: I was able to fix the iSight.  Had a damaged inductor supplying 5v to camera as well as damaged LVD interface cable.  Unit was a water damaged unit.   Thankfully apple put ground next to the 5v rail in the LVD plug or it would of toasted the CPU data lines.
